    Calculate Cercospora latent period

    latent_period.Rd

    Calculate Cercospora latent period

    Usage

    latent_period(Tm, ref = "wolf")

    Arguments

    Tm

    numeric, Average temperature in degrees Celsius for a hour of the day

    ref

    character, method for calculating latent period. Default is "wolf" also available "jarroudi". See references for where formulas were used

    Value

    numeric, Latent period for a given hour. ref = "jarroudi" returns latent period in days.

    Details

    Calculates the latent period for Cercospora beticola infections on sugar beet

    References

    Wolf PFJ, Verreet JA (2005). “Factors Affecting the Onset of Cercospora Leaf Spot Epidemics in Sugar Beet and Establishment of Disease-Monitoring Thresholds.” Phytopathology®, 95(3), 269--274. ISSN 0031-949X, doi:10.1094/PHYTO-95-0269 , Publisher: Scientific Societies, https://apsjournals.apsnet.org/doi/abs/10.1094/PHYTO-95-0269. ; equation 4 El Jarroudi M, Chairi F, Kouadio L, Antoons K, Sallah AM, Fettweis X (2021). “Weather-Based Predictive Modeling of Cercospora beticola Infection Events in Sugar Beet in Belgium.” Journal of Fungi, 7(9), 777. ISSN 2309-608X, doi:10.3390/jof7090777 , https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8470031/. ; equation 1
